description: Actions on Google Client Library for Node.js
name: actions-on-google

scripts.build:clean: yarn clean:pack && yarn clean && yarn build
scripts.docs: typedoc --options typedoc.json --theme node_modules/typedoc-neo-theme/bin/default && touch docs/.nojekyll && yarn docs:redirect && yarn docs:hide
scripts.docs:hide: echo 'a[href="modules/conversation.html"], a[href="conversation.html"], a[href="../modules/conversation.html"] { display: none !important; }' >> docs/assets/css/main.css
scripts.test: yarn build:clean && yarn lint && nyc ava --fail-fast
